Package no.hiof.webframework.repository

Class RepositoryManager

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.repository.RepositoryManager
public class RepositoryManager extends Object
Class used to manage repositories. It allows access and manipulation of data in a database.

    • create

      public static RepositoryManager create(RepositoryConnection repo)

    • insert

      public boolean insert(String tableName, String[] columnNames, Object[] values)
      Inserts a new row into the specified table with the provided column names and values.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to insert into
      columnNames - an array of column names for the insert statement
      values - an array of values corresponding to the column names
      Returns:
      true if the row was inserted successfully, false otherwise

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String tableName, String columnName, Object value)
      Deletes a row from a table with a given table name, column name and value.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table
      columnName - the name of the column to be used as a condition in the WHERE clause of the DELETE statement
      value - the value of the column to be used as a condition in the WHERE clause of the DELETE statement
      Returns:
      true if the row was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getAllRowsFromTable

      public void getAllRowsFromTable(String tableName)
      This method retrieves all rows from the specified table and prints them to the console.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to retrieve rows from.

    • getRowsFromTableWithConditions

      public void getRowsFromTableWithConditions(String tableName, String columnName, String condition)
      Retrieves rows from a specified table with a specified condition on a specified column
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to retrieve rows from
      columnName - The name of the column to use as condition
      condition - The condition to filter the rows by

    • itemCount

      public int itemCount(String tableName, String columnName, String item)
      Counts the number of occurrences of a specific item in a column of a table in the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to search
      columnName - the name of the column to search
      item - the item to count
      Returns:
      the number of occurrences of the item in the column

    • executeSqlQuery

      public void executeSqlQuery(String sqlQuery, String[] columnNames)
      Executes an SQL query and prints the results to the console.
      Parameters:
      sqlQuery - the SQL query to execute
      columnNames - an array of column names to print in the results
